com.smartthings.sdk.smartapp.core.extensions

Interface KeyResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyResolverImpl

    public interface KeyResolver
    KeyResolver

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getKeyString(java.lang.String keyId)
      Get the appropriate unparsed (PEM file text) for the given key id.

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyString

        java.lang.String getKeyString(java.lang.String keyId)
        Get the appropriate unparsed (PEM file text) for the given key id. If the keyId is "SmartThings", this will return the contents of the local file. Otherwise it will use the key lookup service.
